name: BedTime
0:
”Alexa, ask bed time should Mia be in bed”
”Alexa, ask bed time is it Sophie's bed time”
”Alexa, ask bed time is it time Daddy went to bed”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bed time
des: Tell Alexa to ask Bed Time if it's time your kids went to bed and it always is! On the other hand, Mum and Dad can stay up as late as they want.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
